description:
Since they`ve started appearing frequently in movies, TV, and radio programs and getting more exposure in magazines and ads, the whole world seems to be talking about B-PRO. Amidst their rising popularity, Yashamaru tells them that they`ve been scheduled for a concert at the JAPAN Dome on New Year`s Eve. Tsubasa and the members are B-PRO are overjoyed to have their dream of performing at the Dome finally come true. They immediately being preparing for the concert while also planning a surprise birthday party for Yashamaru, who has supported B-PRO since its formation.
Source: crunchyroll
